name: Jorinda_Boffrey
content: Jorinda Boffrey was a Delphidian female Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. She operated at a small Jedi temple at Port Haileap. While visiting the Starlight Beacon space station, Boffrey had offered Jedi Knight Vernestra Rwoh, who had formerly been stationed at Port Haileap for a time, that there was space for her in the temple if she wished to return. Rwoh, however, turned down the offer, choosing to remain longer on Starlight. Some time later, Boffrey sent an alert to Starlight Beacon regarding a possible Nihil attack on Port Haileap, prompting Jedi Master Estala Maru to dispatch Rwoh and her Padawan, Imri Cantaros, to investigate.
